free: #e There are a child, a dog and a frog.
#c 有小孩、狗和青蛙。
#e They play every day.
#c 他們每天玩耍。
#n mi-salama 為 南勢及中部阿美語；mi-hulul 北勢阿美語；mi-balakas 為Sakizaya
#e That child put the frog in the bottle.
#c 那小孩把青蛙放在瓶中。
#n u chungal nu pah 酒瓶
#e That child was sleeping at night.
#c 那小孩在晚上睡覺。
#e That frog was seen (by us).
#c 青蛙被(我們)看。
#n 這裡是敘事者看青蛙
#n melaw 為阿美語 mazih 為 Sakizaya
#e The frog that was in the bottle went out secretly.
#c 在瓶子的那隻青蛙偷跑出去。
#e That child woke up and saw that bottle.
#c 那小孩醒來並看那瓶子。
#e That frog disappeared.
#c 青蛙不見了。
#e They searched for that frog.
#c 他們去找青蛙了。
#n ma-Ca-/ ma-sasi 為reciprocal verbal prefix
#n tengil聽 ma-ta-tengil 互相問
#n ma-la-likeluh (ma-likeluh) 碰面
#n ma-ta-tiik 打架  ma-sa-su-tiik 互相打
#n 但在這有另一形式為 ma-sa-su-verb
#n ma-sa-su-kamu 互相一起講 (開會)
#n ma-sa-su-azih  ma-sa-su-melaw 互相看 (見面)
#e The shoes were turned upside down by the child.
#c 鞋子被小孩翻過來。
#n belih 衍生成反對
#n kucu為日本漢字音，漢字寫成靴
#e They were looking for
#c 他們在床上床下一直找。
#n ka-kabi’-an指床上 ma-bi’ 睡覺
#n libung 瘟疫
#e That dog put (his head) into the bottle and smelled it.
#c 狗把頭放到瓶中並聞一聞。
#e That dog put the bottle on its head.
#c 那狗把瓶子戴在頭上。
#n mi-caledung kaku tu zikuc我穿衣服了 (我穿衣服)
#n ma-caledung aku kya zikuc 衣服被我穿了
#n ma-caledung tu aku 較mi-caledung tu 常用
#n si-kucu 穿鞋
#n si-zikuc 穿衣服
#e It wanted to get rid of that bottle.
#c 它一直想甩掉那瓶子。
#n hyahya-en 原型為hya hya -en (那樣 那樣 -受焦) 用來代替動詞，表示以那樣子重複動詞的動作，如：hyahya-en a mi-banaw 重複洗到乾淨為止。
#n banaw han 一直洗
#e It failed to pull its head out.
#c 它拔不出頭來。
#e That dog kept kicking.
#c 那狗一直踢。
#e That dog fell from bed and then went out to the window.
#c 那狗從床上跌下去，然後走出去到窗戶。
#n mi-hetik kaku tya balaut
#n ma-hetik aku kya balaut
#e That bottle was broken.
#c 那瓶子破了。
#e That child exclaimed, “My dog!”
#c 那小孩大叫：「我的狗啊!」
#e He asked that dog, “Is it painful?”
#c 他對著狗說 ‘會痛嗎’
#e (They) fell outside.
#c 掉到外面了。
#e They went out to search for frog, yelled "Frog! Frog!"
#c 他們到外面找青蛙，叫著「青蛙啊！青蛙啊！」
#e The child and dog searched (for the frog) in bushes and mountains.
#c 小孩跟狗在草叢中及山中找。
#e They saw trees.
#c 他們看到樹。
#e The child thought that frog might hide over there.
#c 小孩認為青蛙可能躲在那裡。
#e He brought his dog.
#c 他就帶著狗。
#e He yelled to the hole on the ground, ‘Frog! Frog!’
#c 他對著地上的洞喊：「青蛙啊！青蛙啊！」
#e The dog barked and saw the beehives hang.
#c 狗吠及看到虎頭蜂窩垂掛著。
#n IU36 為狗叫的擬聲詞
#n IU37中ma-tating為人為的動作; ma-cacuy 為自然地吊掛著
#e (Someone was patting.) That dog shook that tree.
#c (有人在輕拍) 那隻狗搖樹。
#e How was that hornet?
#c 虎頭蜂怎麼了?
#e The hornet flew out.
#c 虎頭蜂飛出來。
#e To the hole, that child yelled at the Frog.
#c 那小孩對著洞裡面呼喊著青蛙。
#e That frog heard sound and came out.
#c 那青蛙聽到聲音就出來。
#e That frog said, “I am here.”
#c 青蛙說：「我在這。」
#e (Why did you do to my house?) The hornet fell off the place where the dog shook.
#c (為何把我家弄成這樣呢?) 虎頭蜂從狗搖的地方掉下來。
#n SAW 中文意思近似於 ‘呢’
#n kya hian是kya hiya-en 那個 的縮寫
#e The hornet said, “Why is it in this way?” and wanted to bite that dog.
#c 虎頭蜂說：「為何會這樣？」 而且想咬那隻狗。
#e That child climbed that tree.
#c 那小孩爬那個樹。
#n mi-kalic 為阿美語，sakizaya 則為mi-kayakay
#e He saw a big tree with a big hole.
#c 看到那棵大樹有洞。
#e He went to see what it is.
#c 他去看是什麼。
#e That child put his hand into the tree hole.
#c 那小孩把手伸進樹洞裡。
#e The owl went out.
#c 貓頭鷹出來。
#n 貓頭鷹亦可為deku
#e The owl said, “what are you doing?” and the child was shocked by owl.
#c 貓頭鷹說：「你做什麼？」小孩被貓頭鷹嚇到了。
#n ma-tawid kya wawa nya kung 的說法較好
#e The child was shocked by the owl.
#c 小孩被貓頭鷹嚇到。
#e The child fell off the tree.
#c 小孩從樹上掉下來。
#e Hornet said, “what is this?”
#c 虎頭蜂就說：「這是什麼東西？」
#e The hornet wondered, “why is my home shaking?
#c 虎頭蜂說：「我住的地方怎麼一直搖呢？」
#n tada 常用在自言自語的時候，如：tada mi-kilul i taku-an
#n 若是有聽話者出現時，則為kya，如：kya mi-kilul i taku-an
#e The hornet wanted to bite that dog.
#c 虎頭蜂追狗想要咬狗。
#e The dog and child ran away in a hurry.
#c 那隻狗跟小孩趕緊跑了。
#e They ran away, and the owl was released.
#c 他們跑走了，貓頭鷹也被放走了。
#e They escaped from hornets.
#c 他們擺脫虎頭蜂了。
#e They went there and saw a big rock.
#c 他們又去那裡看到大岩石。
#e He probably played with the frog.
#c 他可能在玩青蛙。
#e He searched for the frog he kept again.
#c 他重新去找他養的青蛙。
#n habay 為小米，加上使役pa-habay之後，語意成為飼養
#n mi-liyaw ciniza ma-tubah (重複做同一樣動作  跑過去走回來在跑)
#e That child climbed up that rock.
#c 小孩爬上大石頭。
#e He yelled, “Frog! Frog!”
#c 他大喊著：「青蛙啊！青蛙啊！」
#e He was looking for other things.
#c 他探看還有其他的。
#e There were deer in mountain.
#c 那個山有鹿。
#n caket 不確定是何種動物，但應該是鹿之類的動物。
#e He climbed up to the deer to see.
#c 他爬到鹿身上去看。
#e The deer shook its head.
#c 鹿搖動著自己的頭。
#n lingain 為ingain 原形
#e The child fell off from the head of the deer.
#c 小孩從鹿頭上掉下來。
#e That dog fell off in the same way.
#c 那狗也一樣掉下去。
#e The dog slipped and fell into where they stood.
#c 那狗滑倒，跌到下面他們站的地方。
#e The river was deep and the child fell off from the upper part.
#c 河很深，小孩從上面掉下來。
#e The child fell down.
#c 小孩掉下來。
#e He tried to swim, and felt it wasn't bad.
#c 他試著游了一下，覺得還好。
#e The child said, “the water is not deep.”
#c 小孩說：「這水沒很深。」
#e The dog said to the dog, “Here you are!”
#c 小孩對狗說：「你在這裡喔！」
#e The child carried the dog.
#c 小孩扛著狗。
#e The child wanted to search again, but he did not know where to go.
#c 小孩想要去找，可是不知道要去哪裡。
#e He saw a tree.
#c 他看到一棵樹。
#e The tree was here and we climbed up to it.
#c 樹在這裡，而且我們爬到樹上了。
#e He let the dog climb up and he climbed up too.
#c 他讓狗爬上去，他也爬到樹上。
#e He regarded the tree as a ship.
#c 他心想這樹很像一艘船。
#n simsim 為阿美語，撒奇來雅語應該是為zateng
#n tamina為阿美語，撒齊來雅語為balunga
#e They went down there and got wet.
#c 他們去到那裡的下面且沾到水。
#e The water was not deep.
#c 水不深。
#e They came down from the tree.
#c 他們從樹上下來。
#e There were other frogs.
#c 有其他的青蛙。
#e Ah! Here were other frogs.
#c 啊! 這裡還有其他的青蛙。
#n a 在此不表達時態亦不為連詞，為發語詞。
#e There were many frogs.
#c 很多青蛙。
#n yadah 指很多東西 katuud指很多人
#e The child and frog played there.
#c 小孩和青蛙在那裡玩。
#e They were playing in water.
#c 他們在水中一直玩。
#n mi-salama is 為南勢阿美語; mi-hulul 為北勢阿美語
#n 撒齊來雅語則為 mi-dang
#e The child knew that the frog liked to be in water.
#c 小孩知道青蛙喜歡在水中。
#e The child said to the frog, “Come! Come! Come! Let’s play here.”
#c 孩子對著青蛙說：「來來來！我們在這裡玩。」
#e They were having fun in water and swimming.
#c 他們在水裡玩水和游泳。
#e The child was very happy even thought he fell into water many times.
#c 小孩非常高興即使他一再掉進水裡。
#e It was not nervous.
#c 它不緊張。
#e It was probably due to other frogs.
#c 可能有其他的青蛙朋友。
#e There was one frog, but now there were many frogs.
#c 本來只有玩一隻青蛙 現在有很多隻青蛙。
#e They were playing in water.
#c 他們在玩水。
#e It was happy in water.
#c 它在水中很高興。
#n ma-limulak 原意為慶祝
